entry.title: Ukraine Says Fight for Soledar Isn't Over Despite Russian Gains
entry.content: Russian forces spearheaded by the Wagner paramilitary group have advanced into Soledar in recent days, shifting their firepower there after months of failed attempts to seize the nearby city of Bakhmut.

entry.title: Ukraine's Electric-Repair Crews Become Unlikely Wartime Heroes
entry.content: Emergency teams risk their lives and brave subfreezing temperatures to keep the power on as Russia targets Ukraine’s infrastructure in an attempt to sap morale

entry.title: A Sacred Jerusalem Site Becomes a Flashpoint With Israel's Rightward Shift
entry.content: Jewish activists have gained more support for praying at the Temple Mount, called the Noble Sanctuary by Muslims, who have controlled the site for centuries. Far-right officials in Prime Minister Netanyahu’s coalition are pushing to change the rules.
